name: Chocolate Balsamic Vinegar
properties: Can be reduced to syrup consistency
benefits: Chocolate balsamic vinegar combines the antioxidant benefits of balsamic vinegar with chocolate flavors. When reduced, creates a naturally sweet syrup without added sugars. The polyphenols support heart health and metabolic function.
amount: ⅓ cup/75ml (can be reduced by one-third)

quotes: ⅓ cup/75ml chocolate balsamic vinegar or Balsamic Syrup
If not using Balsamic Syrup, pour the chocolate balsamic vinegar into a small saucepan and simmer over low heat for about 10 minutes, or until reduced by about one-third.
